page.title: 03Hedges - Ages and Species
page.content: Dating by species per 30 yards suggest 3 main ages: A. 850-950 yrs.:411326 Lane to Lee Wood B. 650-750 yrs.:432319 Lane to Whattal 407319 Lane to Lee New Farm 428321 Colemere Woods to Colemere. C. 250 yrs. :424304 Kenwick to Ellesmere Road. Various other mainly hawthorn stretches. 411326 is untrimmed for many years, a little used unsurfaced lane. Species include Oak, Ash, Holly, Damson, Hazel, Elm, Hawthorn, Elder, Sycamore, Rose. 432319 is rich in wild flowers, including Hedge Woundwort,Common Toadflax, White Campion, Harebell, Foxglove, Yarrow, Thistle, Clover, Pineapple Mayweed, Hedge Garlic, Tufted Vetch, Black Harehound etc.
